ta.title: එජාප මහ ලේකම් තලතා අතුකෝරාළ
body_lines: முன்னாள் நாடாளுமன்ற வீரர் தலகோரலா UNP இன் புதிய பொதுச் செயலாளராக நியமிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளார். யு.என்.பி.. මීට ඉහත මෙම තනතුර දැරුවේ පාර්ලිමේන්තු මන්ත්‍රී රංග බණ්ඩාර මහතාය.

en.title: UNP General Secretary Telthauhawewa
body_lines: Former Parliamentarian Thalatha Athukorala has been appointed as the new Secretary General of the UNP. Former President of the UNP leader Ranil Wickremesinghe has been appointed today (3). He was speaking this position MP Ran Bandara.
